# JSON Frontmatter Test Document

This document contains JSON frontmatter at the top, which should be parsed correctly by the Markdown linter.

## Content Section

The frontmatter above uses JSON format, which includes:
- String values
- Boolean values
- Array values
- Nested object values
- Number values

## Usage

JSON frontmatter is less common but supported by some systems:
- Custom documentation generators
- API documentation tools
- Headless CMS platforms
